column1: ; Example data file illustrating table-based regression in MOSES.
; Data consists of four columns; the first column is the "result"
; and subsequent columns are the "data to fit".  In this case
; first column is the boolen-or of the remaining columns.

column2: we expect MOSES to learn the combo program "or($1 $2 $3)".
